meanings.definition: A person who uses a hoe to cultivate the soil.
meanings.sent1: The hoer worked hard in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The hoer planted seeds in the freshly tilled soil.
meanings.sent3: The hoer's hoe was his favorite gardening tool.
meanings.sent4: The hoer's dedication to the land was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The hoer's hands were calloused from hours of hoeing.

meanings.definition: To use a hoe to cultivate the soil.
meanings.sent1: She will hoer the garden tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: I hoer the soil to prepare it for planting.
meanings.sent3: He hoers the earth with precision and care.
meanings.sent4: The farmer hoered the field under the hot sun.
